gen:link.msg:message: `ReservesAndFundsDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `NegativeEquityParticipatingInterestsConsolidated` + `UnrealisedAccumulatedIntercompanyResult` - `ProvisionParticipatingInterestsDifferenceSeparateConsolidated` + `ReservesAndFundsDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsOther`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_ReservesAndFundsDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_ReservesAndFundsDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_NegativeEquityParticipatingInterestsConsolidated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_NegativeEquityParticipatingInterestsConsolidated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_UnrealisedAccumulatedIntercompanyResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_UnrealisedAccumulatedIntercompanyResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_ProvisionParticipatingInterestsDifferenceSeparateConsolidated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_ProvisionParticipatingInterestsDifferenceSeparateConsolidated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_ReservesAndFundsDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST104Variables1_ReservesAndFundsDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFundsSeparateFinancialStatements` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ReservesAndFundsSeparateFinancialStatements')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ReservesAndFundsSeparateFinancialStatements return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsSeparateFinancialStatementsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsSeparateFinancialStatementsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsSeparateFinancialStatementsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesReservesFundsConsolidatedSeparateFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsSeparateFinancialStatementsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
